title: Best time to play placements?
body: Seeming as the LoL ranked playerbase atm is probs like 50% smurfs I was wondering if I should wait it out a week or so?

replies.body: Yeah I figured it is actually best to play as early as possible because if u do everyone is in the same situation as you so no one will %%%% around.
Play early because once people are ranked and find out you are in provisionals they might troll to lose you one.
The earlier you play them, the more luck that is involved. If you wait a month, you will most likely be playing the same level of players before the reset.

No point waiting...
1. Vs other smurfs? Great learning experience
2. Have 1-2 smurfs on your team? Probs free win.
3. Start climbing the ladder nice and early..
Or end up getting rekt by smurfs in each and every game and ending up in bronze 5 (yay, I can't wait to have to climb from that hellhole again *sarcasm*)
Bronze 5 is ELO HEAVEN, once you get better you will start smashing it.
